name: OctoPunch
description:
Octopunch is a fun multiplayer game with dynamic music, where you play as colored octopus on a drifting water wings, you have to push other players out of it. The last octopus standing wins.

The game is meant to be played with 2 to 4 peoples.

Done by a student team during a Game Jam at l’Institut de l’Internet et du Multimédia, a french videogame school.

Realised by :

Quentin ROMAND - Julien BARREAULT - Romain VUARCHEX - Paul THIBAULT - Thomas DELHAYE - Jean HARDY

All together we decided to port this project on Nintendo Switch and we are currently working on a lot of improvements.

Contact Us: octopunchteam@gmail.com
